com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Interface SpenObjectRuntime.UpdateListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SpenObjectRuntime

    public static interface SpenObjectRuntime.UpdateListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for Spen ObjectRuntime update events. 
     (example)
 SpenObjectRuntime.UpdateListener objectRuntimelistener;
 objectRuntimelistener = new SpenObjectRuntime.UpdateListener() {

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCanceled(int state, Object objectBase)
      Called when object insertion in a ObjectRuntime is canceled.
      void onCompleted(Object objectBase)
      Called when object insertion in a ObjectRuntime is completed.
      void onObjectUpdated(RectF rect, Object objectBase)
      Called when an object in a ObjectRuntime is updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onObjectUpdated

        void onObjectUpdated(RectF rect,
                   Object objectBase)
        Called when an object in a ObjectRuntime is updated.
        Parameters:
        rect - The area containing the object .
        objectBase - The updated object.

      • onCanceled

        void onCanceled(int state,
              Object objectBase)
        Called when object insertion in a ObjectRuntime is canceled.
        Parameters:
        state - if object insertion is cancelled in the beginning - SpenObjectRuntimeInterface.CANCEL_STATE_INSERT if object insertion is cancelled during the process - SpenObjectRuntimeInterface.CANCEL_STATE_RUN
        objectBase - The cancelled object.

      • onCompleted

        void onCompleted(Object objectBase)
        Called when object insertion in a ObjectRuntime is completed.
        Parameters:
        objectBase - The object inserted.
